tests.input: Агрессивная антиреклама - одно из лучших маркетинговых средств по продвижению товаров на российский рынок. Качество и другие потребительские свойства продукции при этом не имеют значения. Эта "уму непостижимая" истина понятна теперь уже и прогрессивно мыслящим европейским производителям.
tests.output: Aggressive anti-advertising is one of the best marketing tools for promoting goods on the Russian market. The quality and other consumer properties of products do not matter. This "incomprehensible" truth is now clear to progressively thinking European manufacturers.
tests.llm_output: Aggressive anti-advertising is one of the best marketing tools for promoting goods on the Russian market. Quality and other consumer properties of products do not matter. This "incomprehensible" truth is now clear to progressively thinking European manufacturers as well.

tests.input: Дж. Дж. Томсон и его сын Джордж Томсон были удостоены Нобелевских премий по физике: первый в 1906 году за демонстрацию того, что электрон является частицей, а второй в 1937 году за демонстрацию того, что электрон является волной.
tests.output: J. J. Thomson and his son George Thomson were both awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics: the former in 1906 for demonstrating that the electron is a particle, and the latter in 1937 for showing that the electron is a wave.
tests.llm_output: J. J. Thomson and his son George Thomson were awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics: the former in 1906 for demonstrating that the electron is a particle and the latter in 1937 for demonstrating that the electron is a wave.

tests.input: По мнению Тома, теория эволюции путем случайных мутаций и естественного отбора неубедительна по нескольким причинам, самой важной из которых является существование ДНК. Среди прочих неприемлемых пунктов, добавляет Том, эта теория утверждает, что человеческий разум – Сократа, Платона, Аристотеля, Галилея, Ньютона, Шекспира, Декарта, да Винчи, Моцарта, Эйнштейна, самого Дарвина – развился из разума неизвестного примата, который якобы был нашим предком.
tests.output: According to Tom, the theory of evolution by random mutations and natural selection is not convincing for several reasons, the most important of which is the existence of DNA. Among other unacceptable points, Tom adds, this theory claims that the human mind – Socrates, Plato, Aristotle, Galileo, Newton, Shakespeare, Descartes, Da Vinci, Mozart, Einstein, Darwin himself – evolved from the mind of an unidentified primate, which would be our ancestor.
tests.llm_output: According to Tom, the theory of evolution by random mutations and natural selection is unconvincing for several reasons, the most important of which is the existence of DNA. Among other unacceptable points, Tom adds, this theory claims that the human mind - Socrates, Plato, Aristotle, Galileo, Newton, Shakespeare, Descartes, Da Vinci, Mozart, Einstein, Darwin himself - evolved from the mind of an unknown primate who was supposedly our ancestor.

tests.input: Отцы современной науки – Коперник, Галилей, Кеплер, Ньютон, Бойль и многие другие – видели явные доказательства замысла во Вселенной и, по сути, были вдохновлены на открытие законов природы своей верой в трансцендентного законодателя.
tests.output: The fathers of modern science – Copernicus, Galileo, Kepler, Newton, Boyle, and many others – saw clear evidence of design in the universe and, in fact, were inspired to discover the laws of nature by their faith in a transcendent lawgiver.
tests.llm_output: The fathers of modern science-Copernicus, Galileo, Kepler, Newton, Boyle, and many others-saw clear evidence of design in the universe and, in fact, were inspired to discover the laws of nature by their belief in a transcendent lawgiver.

tests.input: Государство, которое доверит свою защиту наёмникам, рано или поздно погибнет, как погиб Древний Рим, чьи жители хотели только есть и развлекаться, а защиту родной земли оставили германцам. Те предали своих нанимателей, как только это стало выгодно. Настоящий, сильный враг только тогда отступает, когда против него готовы встать все жители страны.
tests.output: A state that entrusts its protection to mercenaries will sooner or later perish, as did ancient Rome, whose inhabitants only wanted to eat and entertain themselves, and left the protection of their native land to the Germanic tribes. The latter betrayed their employers as soon as it became profitable. A real, strong enemy retreats only when all the inhabitants of the country are ready to stand up against it.
tests.llm_output: A state that entrusts its defense to mercenaries will sooner or later perish, as did ancient Rome, whose inhabitants only wanted to eat and have fun, and left the defense of their native land to the Germans. They betrayed their employers as soon as it became profitable. A real, strong enemy only retreats when all the inhabitants of the country are ready to stand against him.

tests.input: Благодаря высокоточным выступлениям обоих игроков ничьей завершился одиннадцатый матч чемпионата мира по шахматам ФИДЕ 2023. Сейчас (24 апреля): Непомнящий 6, Дин Лижэнь 5. Еще трех ничьих будет достаточно, чтобы россиянин вышел в счет (7.5) что даст ему титул чемпиона мира.
tests.output: With high-precision performances from both players, the eleventh match of the FIDE World Chess Championship 2023 ended in a draw. Now (April 24): Nepo 6, Ding Liren 5. Three more draws will be enough for the Russian to reach the tally (7.5) which will give him the title of World Champion
tests.llm_output: Thanks to high-precision performances by both players, the eleventh match of the FIDE World Chess Championship 2023 ended in a draw. Now (April 24): Nepomnyashchy 6, Ding Lizhen 5. Three more draws will be enough for the Russian to go into the score (7.5), which will give him the world title.

tests.input: Томас понимает, что природные законы и силы, пространство-время, электромагнитные и гравитационные поля, энергия, атомы, звезды, галактики, жизнь - словом, все зародилось в неописуемой сингулярности, которая таинственным образом взорвалась: Большой взрыв.
tests.output: Thomas understands that natural laws and forces, space-time, electromagnetic and gravitational fields, energy, atoms, stars, galaxies, life, everything, in short, had its origin in an indescribable singularity that mysteriously exploded: the Big Bang.
tests.llm_output: Thomas realizes that natural laws and forces, space-time, electromagnetic and gravitational fields, energy, atoms, stars, galaxies, life-in short, everything originated in an indescribable singularity that mysteriously exploded: the Big Bang.

tests.input: Человечество зашло в тупик, оно катастрофически катится в бездну, впереди нет ничего, кроме безумия и тьмы, возврата к первобытному варварству - такова перспектива, расписываемая буржуазными смертяшкиными.
tests.output: Humanity has reached a dead end; it is catastrophically rolling into the abyss; there is nothing ahead but madness and darkness, a return to primitive barbarism — such is the perspective painted by bourgeois mortals.
tests.llm_output: Mankind has reached a dead end, it is rolling catastrophically into the abyss, there is nothing but madness and darkness ahead, a return to primitive barbarism - such is the perspective painted by the bourgeois death-mongers.

tests.input: Дин Лижэнь — новый чемпион мира по шахматам. На тай-брейке первые три партии закончились вничью, а четвертую, когда Дин вел черными в испанском дебюте, сенсационно выиграл китайский дракон, который таким образом победил русского медведя Яна Непомнящего. У вершины шахматной вселенной новое лицо.
tests.output: Ding Liren is the new World Chess Champion. In the tiebreaker, the first three games ended in a draw, and the fourth, with Ding leading the black pieces in a Spanish opening, was sensationally won by the Chinese Dragon, who thus overcame the Russian Bear, Ian Nepomniachtchi. The top of the chess universe has a new face.
tests.llm_output: Ding Lizhen is the new world chess champion. In the tie-break, the first three games ended in a draw, and the fourth, when Ding led with black in the Spanish opening, was sensationally won by the Chinese dragon, who thus defeated the Russian bear Jan Nepomnyashchy. The top of the chess universe has a new face.

tests.input: В университете разрабатывается механизм широкого внедрения корпоративной системы управления по типу Назарбаев Университета, прорабатывается переход к предоставлению автономии вузу поэтапно - с 2014 года; с 2012 года у нас функционирует наблюдательный совет с большими законодательно установленными полномочиями.
tests.output: The university is developing a mechanism for the widespread introduction of a corporate management system similar to that of Nazarbayev University. Since 2014, a transition to granting autonomy to the university has been worked out in stages. Since 2012, we have had a supervisory board with extensive legislative powers.
tests.llm_output: The university is developing a mechanism for the widespread introduction of a corporate management system similar to Nazarbayev University, the transition to granting autonomy to the university in stages, beginning in 2014, and since 2012 we have had a supervisory board with extensive statutory powers.

tests.input: Однако мы должны добиться избавления от сегодняшней безнравственности не на основе образцов, преподносимых "молодыми душами" с юга, а собственно по тюрко-татарски, то есть с помощью опыта зрелых душ.
tests.output: However, we must achieve deliverance from today's immorality not on the basis of the examples presented by "young souls" from the south, but in the Turkic-Tatar way, that is, with the help of the experience of mature souls.
tests.llm_output: However, we must achieve deliverance from today's immorality not on the basis of samples presented by "young souls" from the south, but by the Turkic-Tatar experience itself, that is, by the experience of mature souls.

tests.input: Жизнь - это синоним химической инженерии немыслимой сложности, компартментализации и невероятно точной организации. Совершенно невозможно приписать это богу Случаю и бессознательному и слепому действию богини Естественного Отбора.
tests.output: Life is synonymous with chemical engineering of inconceivable complexity, compartmentalization, and incredibly precise organization. It is absolutely impossible to attribute it to the god Chance and the unconscious and blind action of the goddess Natural Selection.
tests.llm_output: Life is synonymous with chemical engineering of unimaginable complexity, compartmentalization and incredibly precise organization. It is utterly impossible to attribute this to the god of Chance and the unconscious and blind action of the goddess of Natural Selection.

tests.input: «О! Старик очнулся». — «Где я?» — «В Хайруле. Ты был в коме». — «И сколько?» — «Месяц». — «Понятно. Что случилось, пока я...» — «Довольно! Я отправляюсь в Сабвей поужинать». — «Да, мы идём — Линк, ты тоже с нами?» — «Да. Я так проголодался, что динозавра съел бы!»
tests.output: Hey! That old guy woke up. "Where am I?" "In Hyrule. You were in a coma." "How long?" "A month." "I see. What happened during the time I—" "Enough! I'm going to Subway for dinner." "Yeah, we're going — Link, are you going too?" "Yeah. I'm so hungry I could eat a dinosaur!"
tests.llm_output: "Oh! The old man is awake." - "Where am I?" - "In Hyrule. You were in a coma." - "And for how long?" - "A month." - "I see. What happened while I..." - "That's enough! I'm going to Subway for dinner." - "Yes, we're going - Link, are you coming too?" - "Yes. I'm so hungry I could eat a dinosaur!"

tests.input: Если бы Дарвин был жив сегодня, смог ли бы он вообразить, что очень сложная система обработки информации, которую наши передовые технологии позволяют нам увидеть в действии в клетках, возникла случайно, вслепую и путем естественного отбора?
tests.output: If Darwin lived today, would he have imagined that the highly sophisticated information-processing system that our advanced technology allows us to see in action in cells came about randomly and blindly and by natural selection?
tests.llm_output: If Darwin were alive today, could he have imagined that the highly complex information-processing system that our advanced technology allows us to see in action in cells arose by chance, blindly and by natural selection?

tests.input: Вот здесь скриншот страницы их магазина недельной давности, а вот здесь то, как она же выглядит сегодня. На них указан один и тот же ценник, но текущая версия утверждает, что всё идёт с 50% скидкой. Странно, не находишь?
tests.output: Here's a screenshot of their store page from a week ago, and here's what it looks like today. They have the exact same prices listed, but the current one claims they're all 50% off. Strange, isn't it?
tests.llm_output: Here's a screenshot of their store page from a week ago, and here's what it looks like today. They have the same price tag, but the current version claims everything is 50% off. Weird, don't you think?

tests.input: Ты поверишь, он всё ещё выступает в восемьдесят лет? Сэр Пол никогда не останавливается. Возможно, он будет здесь и в 90, кто знает!" - "Не может быть". - "Мы так говорили, когда ему было семьдесят!"
tests.output: Can you believe he is still performing at eighty years old? Sir Paul never stops. He might be out here at ninety, who knows! "No way." "That's what we said when he was seventy!"
tests.llm_output: Would you believe he's still performing at eighty? Sir Paul never stops. Maybe he'll still be here at ninety, who knows!" - "No way." - "That's what we said when he was seventy!"

tests.input: «Ваше Величество, Гэнон и его прислужники выпустили в мир коронавирус!» – «Здорово, я захвачу туалетную бумагу». – «Нет времени». – «Чем мы можем помочь?» – «Как написано: НЕ трогайте лицо». – «Хмм... (Король задумчиво подпирает рукой подбородок.) ...Что?» – «Вам пиздец». – «Ой! Линк, спаси меня!» – «Мне, верно, надо поместить себя в карантин», – говорит Линк и улетает прочь на ковре-самолёте.
tests.output: Your Majesty, Ganon and his minions have released the coronavirus! "Great, I'll grab my toilet paper." "There is no time." "How can we help?" "It is written: do NOT touch your face." "Hmm... (The King rests his chin on his hand thoughtfully.) ...What?" "You're fucked." "Oah! Link, save me!" "I guess I'd better get quarantined," Link says and flies away on a magic carpet.
tests.llm_output: "Your Majesty, Ganon and his minions have released a coronavirus into the world!" - "Great, I'll grab the toilet paper." - "No time." - "How can we help?" - "As it says: DO NOT touch your face." - "Hmm... (King pens his hand under his chin thoughtfully.) ...What?" - "You're fucked." - "Ow! Link, save me!" - "I should probably put myself in quarantine," Link says and flies away on a magic carpet.

tests.input: Ученые определяют начало межзвездного пространства как место, где постоянный поток вещества и магнитное поле Солнца перестают влиять на его окружающую среду. Это место называют гелиопаузой. Она отмечает конец области, созданной нашим солнцем, которая называется гелиосферой.
tests.output: Scientists define the beginning of interstellar space as the place where the sun’s constant flow of material and magnetic field stop affecting its surroundings. This place is called the heliopause. It marks the end of a region created by our sun that is called the heliosphere.
tests.llm_output: Scientists define the beginning of interstellar space as the place where the constant flow of matter and the Sun's magnetic field cease to affect its environment. This place is called the heliopause. It marks the end of the region created by our sun, which is called the heliosphere.

tests.input: «Чёрт возьми, нельзя выгонять меня из собственного дома! Это незаконно, знаете ли». – «Э, я, наверно, напился и выставил замок на eBay». – «Ты что сделал?» – «По-моему, он сказал, что выставил замок на eBay». – «Да знаю я, что он сказал!» – «Не волнуйтесь, друзья мои, я разрулю эту ситуацию. Мы заявимся к герцогу Онкледу!» – «...Ты, поди, шутишь».
tests.output: What the hell? You can't kick me out of my house! That is illegal, you know. "Uh, I might have gotten drunk and put the castle on eBay." "You... you did what?" "I think he said he put the castle on eBay." "I know what he said!" "Do not worry, my friends, I'm going to take care of this situation. We're going to crash at Duke Onkled's!" "...You've got to be kidding."
tests.llm_output: "Damn it, you can't kick me out of my own house! It's illegal, you know." - "Uh, I must have gotten drunk and put the lock on eBay." - "You did what?" - "I think he said he put the lock on eBay." - "I know what he said!" - "Don't worry, my friends, I'll handle this situation. We'll show up at Duke Onclead's!" - "...You've got to be kidding me."

tests.input: Каждый паук - разносторонний гений: он планирует свою паутину, как архитектор, а затем осуществляет этот план, как искусный ткач. Он также является химиком, который может синтезировать шелк с помощью управляемого компьютером производственного процесса, а затем использовать его для прядения.
tests.output: Every spider is a versatile genius: It plans its web like an architect and then carries out this plan like the proficient weaver it is. It is also a chemist who can synthesize silk employing a computer-controlled manufacturing process, and then use the silk for spinning.
tests.llm_output: Every spider is a versatile genius: he plans his web like an architect and then carries out that plan like a skilled weaver. He is also a chemist who can synthesize silk using a computer-controlled manufacturing process and then use it for spinning.

tests.input: Эксплуатируемый и угнетаемый класс — пролетариат — не сможет освободиться от эксплуатирующего и угнетающего класса — буржуазии — без того, чтобы навсегда освободить всё общество от эксплуатации, угнетения и классовой борьбы.
tests.output: The exploited and oppressed class — the proletariat — will not be able to free itself from the exploiting and oppressive class — the bourgeoisie — without first freeing the whole of society from exploitation, oppression and class struggle.
tests.llm_output: The exploited and oppressed class, the proletariat, cannot free itself from the exploiting and oppressing class, the bourgeoisie, without freeing all of society forever from exploitation, oppression, and class struggle.

tests.input: С 26 по 28 сентября 2015 года девять человек из пяти стран собрались в Брно, Чешская Республика, чтобы вместе весело провести время, изучая язык токипона. В этом видео они находятся в университетском ботаническом саду и рассказывают о том, что видят.
tests.output: From the 26th to the 28th of September 2015, nine people from five countries gathered in Brno (Czech Republic) to have fun together learning and using the Toki Pona language. In this video they are in a university botanical garden and talk about what they see.
tests.llm_output: From September 26-28, 2015, nine people from five countries gathered in Brno, Czech Republic, to have fun together while learning the Tokipon language. In this video, they are in the university botanical garden and talk about what they see.

tests.input: Они все одинаковые! - "Что ты, Стёпа! Такое впечатление, что ты никогда не ебался!" - "Профессор, у меня нет времени, чтобы ебаться!" - "Лох, это большое удовольствие!" - "Профессор, я хочу с вами!" - "Ну да, да! Ты сейчас как всегда соснёшь!" - "Да, вы правы".
tests.output: They're all the same! "Come on, Styopa – looks like you've never fucked!" "Professor, I have no time for fucking." "You dummy, it's a great pleasure." "Professor, I want to do it with you." "Yeah, say that again! You're gonna suck just like always." "Yes, you're right."
tests.llm_output: They're all the same! - "What are you, Stjepa! It's like you've never fucked!" - "Professor, I don't have time to fuck!" - "Loch, it's a great pleasure!" - "Professor, I want to go with you!" - "Yeah, yeah, yeah! You're gonna suck it like you always do!" - "Yeah, you're right."

tests.input: Сулла начал убивать своих врагов, и Цезарь значился в списке тех, кому было суждено умереть. Семья матери Цезаря умоляла о его пощаде, и Сулла неохотно согласился. Затем Цезарь вступил в римскую армию и возвратился после смерти Суллы.
tests.output: Sulla began to kill his enemies, and Caesar was on the list of the people that he was going to kill. Caesar’s mother’s family begged for his life, and Sulla, reluctantly, spared him. Then Caesar joined the Roman army and returned after Sulla’s death.
tests.llm_output: Sulla began to kill his enemies, and Caesar was on the list of those destined to die. Caesar's mother's family begged for his mercy, and Sulla reluctantly agreed. Caesar then joined the Roman army and returned after Sulla's death.

tests.input: Многие еретики, ведьмы и атеисты были сожжены на кострах инквизиции. Сегодня ученый, который по неосторожности заявляет, что верит в сверхъестественный интеллект, будет подвергнут дискриминации со стороны его сверстников-материалистов и будет иметь неприятности в своей профессиональной деятельности.
tests.output: Many heretics, witches, and atheists were burned at the stake of the Inquisition. Today, the scientist who unwittingly declares that he believes in a supernatural intelligence will be discriminated against by his materialistic peers and persecuted in his professional career.
tests.llm_output: Many heretics, witches, and atheists were burned at the fires of the Inquisition. Today, a scientist who carelessly claims to believe in supernatural intelligence will be discriminated against by his materialist peers and have trouble in his professional life.

tests.input: «Ты что, гад, из ума выжил?» – «Видимо. Эта поганая мелкая тварь...» – «И что? Ты лишился логова? Хватит ныть, в следующий раз сделай логово получше». – «Следующего раза, наверно, не будет...» – «Верни замок, а не то!..»
tests.output: You prick! Have you lost your mind?! "Probably. That miserable little twerp—" "So what? You lost your lair? Stop whining and make a greater lair next time." "There probably won't be a next time..." "Bring the castle back, or else!"
tests.llm_output: "Are you out of your mind, you bastard?" - "Apparently. That fucking little bitch..." - "So? You lost your lair? Stop whining and make a better lair next time." - "There probably won't be a next time..." - "Give me back the lock, or else..."

tests.input: Я рад, что был на войне и видел сам все ужасы, неизбежно связанные с войной, и после этого я думаю, что всякий человек с сердцем не может желать войны, а всякий правитель, которому Богом вверен народ, должен принимать все меры, для того чтобы избегать ужасов войны.
tests.output: I'm glad that I have been to war and have personally seen all the horrors that are inevitably connected with war, and after that I think that anyone with a heart cannot wish for war, and any ruler whom God entrusted his people to must take every measure to avoid the horrors of war.
tests.llm_output: I am glad I have been to war and have seen for myself all the horrors inevitably connected with war, and after that I think that every man with a heart cannot desire war, and every ruler, to whom God has entrusted a people, must take all measures to avoid the horrors of war.

tests.input: Две клетки (сперматозоид и яйцеклетка) соединяются вместе, образуя новую клетку (эмбрион), которая размножается путем деления в геометрической прогрессии, образуя человеческое существо, насчитывающее около 37 триллионов клеток.
tests.output: Two cells (a sperm and an egg) come together to form a new cell (the embryo), which replicates by division in geometric progression to form a human being, which has about 37 trillion cells.
tests.llm_output: Two cells (a sperm cell and an egg cell) join together to form a new cell (an embryo), which multiplies by dividing exponentially to form a human being of about 37 trillion cells.

tests.input: Если кто-то незнакомый говорит, что вы говорите как носитель языка, это значит, что он, вероятно, заметил что-то в вашей речи, что дало ему понять, что вы не носитель. Другими словами, вы не говорите как носитель.
tests.output: If someone who doesn't know your background says that you sound like a native speaker, it means they probably noticed something about your speaking that made them realize you weren't a native speaker. In other words, you don't really sound like a native speaker.
tests.llm_output: If someone you don't know says that you speak like a native speaker, it means that they probably noticed something in your speech that let them know that you are not a native speaker. In other words, you don't sound like a native speaker.

tests.input: Можно ли поверить, что субатомные частицы, а также весьма своеобразные силы, которые заставляют их объединяться для образования материи, не являются результатом работы Сверхъестественного Разума?
tests.output: Is it possible to believe that subatomic particles, as well as the very peculiar forces that lead them to combine to generate matter, are not the work of a Supernatural Intelligence?
tests.llm_output: Can we believe that subatomic particles, and the very peculiar forces that cause them to combine to form matter, are not the result of the work of a Supernatural Mind?

tests.input: «Только подумай, чего мы могли бы добиться совместными усилиями! Ты мог бы править этой могучей империей рядом со мной! Но вместо того ты решил защитить человечество. Как это жалко». Злодей усмехнулся.
tests.output: Just imagine what we could have done if we had joined forces! You could have ruled this mighty empire by my side! Instead you chose to protect humanity. How pathetic. The villain smirked.
tests.llm_output: "Just think what we could accomplish together! You could have ruled this mighty empire beside me! But instead you chose to protect humanity. How pathetic." The villain grinned.

tests.input: Читая некоторые современные книги, мы с облегчением отмечаем, что учёные начинают понимать, что не все удивительно разумные процессы создания, поддержания и эволюции жизни возникли исключительно благодаря случайности и естественному отбору.
tests.output: It is encouraging to see by reading some modern books that scientists are beginning to realize that not all the amazingly intelligent processes of the creation, maintenance, and evolution of life arose solely by chance and natural selection.
tests.llm_output: As we read some of today's books, we are relieved to note that scientists are beginning to realize that not all of life's amazingly intelligent processes of creation, maintenance, and evolution arose solely through chance and natural selection.

tests.input: В матче за звание чемпиона мира ФИДЕ 2023 по шахматам ничья (6 X 6), Дин Лирен (белые) выиграла двенадцатую партию. Осталось еще две партии, чтобы один из участников добился решающего преимущества.
tests.output: The match for the FIDE 2023 World Chess Championship is tied (6 X 6), with Ding Liren (White) winning the twelfth game. Only two more games remain for one of the competitors to achieve the decisive advantage.
tests.llm_output: In the 2023 FIDE World Chess Championship match, the draw (6 X 6), Dean Liren (white) won the twelfth game. Two more games remain for one of the participants to achieve a decisive advantage.

tests.input: — Я школьная учительница. Получаю на руки пятнадцать тысяч рублей в месяц. А в полиции никто не получает меньше пятидесяти тысяч. Почему такая несправедливость? — Потому что полиция исправляет ваши ошибки.
tests.output: I am a school teacher. I receive fifteen thousand rubles a month, while in the police, nobody gets less than fifty thousand. Why such injustice? "Because the police fixes your faults."
tests.llm_output: - I am a schoolteacher. I get fifteen thousand rubles a month. But no one in the police gets less than fifty thousand. Why such an injustice? - Because the police correct your mistakes.

tests.input: Вода выполняет несколько важных функций в организме человека. Она служит в качестве транспортного средства для питательных веществ, регулирует температуру тела и играет важную роль в обмене веществ.
tests.output: Water fulfills several vital functions in a human organism. It serves as a means for transport of nutrients, regulates body temperature, and plays an important part in metabolism.
tests.llm_output: Water performs several important functions in the human body. It serves as a vehicle for nutrients, regulates body temperature, and plays an important role in metabolism.

tests.input: Бряцание ядерным оружием со стороны России привлекло внимание высших должностных лиц американской разведки, некоторые из которых выражают растущую обеспокоенность готовностью Кремля задействовать часть своего ядерного потенциала вследствие "возможной безысходности" на Украине.
tests.output: Russia’s nuclear saber-rattling has the attention of top U.S. intelligence officials, some of whom are expressing growing concern about the Kremlin’s willingness to unleash some of its nuclear arsenal as it faces “potential desperation” in Ukraine.
tests.llm_output: Russia's rattling of nuclear weapons has drawn the attention of top U.S. intelligence officials, some of whom have expressed growing concern about the Kremlin's willingness to activate some of its nuclear capabilities because of "possible hopelessness" in Ukraine.

tests.input: «Том, что у тебя за отношения с горностаями?» — «Да, в общем, ничего особенного, просто они мне кажутся очень занимательными». — «Но ты постоянно в разговорах упоминаешь горностаев и большую часть свободного времени проводишь, изучая их поведение. Может, это немного чересчур?» — «Это просто у меня такое хобби. Может у человека быть хобби?"
tests.output: Tom, what is this between you and stoats? "Nothing much, really. I simply find them very fascinating." "But you're making references to stoats all the time in your speech, and spend most of your free time studying stoat behaviour. Isn't that a bit obsessive?" "It's just my personal hobby. Can't a man have a hobby?"
tests.llm_output: "Tom, what's your relationship with stoats?" - "Oh, nothing much, I just find them very entertaining." - "But you mention stoats all the time in your conversations and spend most of your free time studying their behavior. Maybe that's a little too much?" - "It's just a hobby I have. Can a person have a hobby?"

tests.input: В три года слово «завтра» означало для меня «через почти бесконечно много времени», поэтому, когда родители говорили мне, что я получу что-то завтра, то я начинал плакать, потому что это означало, что я никогда не получу того, чего хотел. Теперь же, в умудрённом семилетнем возрасте, дождаться следующего дня было гораздо легче, и я даже мог осмыслить, что, когда приходила зима, это было не навсегда.
tests.output: When I was three, 'tomorrow' to me meant 'in a nearly infinite amount of time', so when my parents would tell me I was going to get something tomorrow, I would start crying since it meant I could never get what I wanted. Now, though, at the wise age of seven, waiting for the following day to come was much easier, and I was even able to comprehend that the onset of winter would not last forever.
tests.llm_output: When I was three, "tomorrow" meant "in an almost infinite amount of time," so when my parents told me I would get something tomorrow, I would start crying because it meant I would never get what I wanted. Now, at the ripe old age of seven, it was much easier to wait for the next day, and I could even comprehend that when winter came, it wasn't forever.

tests.input: Руи Лопес де Сегура, священник и известный испанский шахматист XVI века, написал книгу на 150 страниц под названием Libro del Ajedrez, посвящённую подробному исследованию им дебюта 1. e4 e5 2. ♘f3 ♞c6 3. ♗b5, названного в его честь.
tests.output: Ruy López de Segura, a priest and a famous Spanish chess player of the 16th century, wrote a book of 150 pages, called Libro del Ajedrez, about exhaustive studies he made on the opening (1. e4 e5 2. ♘f3 ♘c6 3. ♗b5) that is named after him.
tests.llm_output: Rui López de Segura, a priest and famous 16th century Spanish chess player, wrote a 150 page book called Libro del Ajedrez dedicated to his detailed study of the opening 1. e4 e5 2. ♘f3 ♞c6 3. ♗b5, named after him.

tests.input: Хотя король Харкиниан, в сущности, всеяден, насколько это вообще возможно для человека, его бесспорно любимая еда — легендарная овсянка Munf Munf. Любопытным исключением из его привычки сметать всё, что выложено на обеденный стол, является спагетти, к которому он питает глубокую неприязнь, и своим указом запретил кому бы то ни было проносить его в замок Хайрул. Марио и Луиджи — единственные, кому за нарушение сего указа въезд в королевство Хайрул запрещён пожизненно.
tests.output: Although King Harkinian is pretty much an omnivore, as much as a human being could ever be, his favourite food is by far the fabled Munf Munf cereal. One curious exception to his habit of eating everything that's on the dinner table is spaghetti, which he loathes deeply, decreeing that nobody bring it into Hyrule Castle. Luigi and Mario are the only people banned from the Hyrule Kingdom for life for violating this order.
tests.llm_output: Although King Harkinian is essentially as omnivorous as humanly possible, his indisputable favorite food is the legendary oatmeal Munf Munf. A curious exception to his habit of sweeping away everything on the dinner table is spaghetti, for which he has a deep dislike, and he has decreed that no one may bring it into Hyrule Castle. Mario and Luigi are the only ones banned from entering the kingdom of Hyrule for life for violating this decree.

tests.input: Если мы видим, что побеждает Германия, надо помочь России, а если побеждает Россия – надо помочь Германии, и таким образом позволить им убивать друг друга как можно больше, хотя победу Гитлера я не желаю видеть ни при каких обстоятельствах.
tests.output: If we see that Germany is winning the war we ought to help Russia, and if Russia is winning we ought to help Germany, and that way let them kill as many as possible, although I don't want to see Hilter victorious under any circumstances.
tests.llm_output: If we see that Germany wins, we should help Russia, and if Russia wins, we should help Germany, and thus allow them to kill each other as much as possible, although I do not wish to see Hitler win under any circumstances.

tests.input: Кто неприятелю пароль, или лозунг объявит, хотя офицер или рядовой, или даст оному иные какие изменнические сигналы, стрельбою, пением, криком, огнем и сему подобное, оный яко изменник казнен будет.
tests.output: Whoever, whether it be an officer or a private, announces a password or slogan to the enemy, or gives it some other treacherous signals, by shooting, singing, shouting, fire, or the like, will be executed as a traitor.
tests.llm_output: Whoever announces to the enemy a password or a slogan, though an officer or a private, or gives him any other treasonable signals, by shooting, singing, shouting, firing, and the like, he shall be put to death as a traitor.

tests.input: “Ну, князь, Генуя и Лукка — поместья фамилии Бонапарте. Нет, я вам вперед говорю, если вы мне не скажете, что у нас война, если вы еще позволите себе защищать все гадости, все ужасы этого Антихриста — право, я верю, что он Антихрист — я вас больше не знаю, вы уж не друг мой, вы уж не мой верный раб, как вы говорите! Ну, здравствуйте, здравствуйте. Я вижу, что я вас пугаю; садитесь и рассказывайте.”
tests.output: “Well, my Prince, so Genoa and Lucca are now just endowments, family estates of the Bonapartes. But I warn you, if you don't tell me that we will have war, if you still try to soften all the infamies, all the horrors perpetrated by that Antichrist — I really believe he is Antichrist — I will have nothing more to do with you, and you are no longer my friend, no longer my ‘faithful slave,’ as you call yourself! But how do you do? I see I have frightened you; sit down and tell me all the news.”
tests.llm_output: "Well, Prince, Genoa and Lucca are the estates of the Bonaparte family. No, I tell you up front, if you do not tell me that we are at war, if you still allow yourself to defend all the nastiness, all the horrors of this Antichrist - right, I believe that he is the Antichrist - I do not know you anymore, you are no longer my friend, you are no longer my faithful slave, as you say! Well, hello, hello. I see that I frighten you; sit down and tell."

tests.input: «Ух ты! Такое красивое утро у нас здесь сегодня! Мне в самом деле не терпится – а? Что такое?» – «Как дела, Линк?» – «Моршу, в чём дело?» – «Ха, всё просто. Благодаря денежному успеху моих предприятий и карьеры в битбоксе я разбогател!» – «Ого, и ты решил устроить нам вечеринку?» – «Ха, нет. Охрана, вышвырните этих гондонов».
tests.output: Oh boy! It sure is a beautiful morning around here! In fact, I can't wait to–huh? What happened? "What's up, Link?" "Morshu, what is going on?" "Hah, simple. With all the money I made from my successful businesses and my successful beatboxing career, I got rich!" "Wow, so you threw us a party?" "Hah, nope. Security, get those motherfuckers out."
tests.llm_output: "Wow, it's such a beautiful morning we have here today! I really can't wait - huh? What is it?" - "What's up, Link?" - "Morshu, what's up?" - "Ha, it's simple. Thanks to the monetary success of my ventures and beatboxing career, I'm getting rich!" - "Wow, and you decided to throw us a party?" - "Ha, no. Security, kick those faggots out."

tests.input: В Луганске и Донецке (Украина) воюет сейчас немало российских наёмников, которые на деле являются неплатёжеспособными должниками по кредитам. Москва погашает долги этих "добровольцев" из расчёта 100 долларов за сутки.
tests.output: In Lugansk and Donetsk, Ukraine, there are now quite a few Russian mercenaries who are actually insolvent debtors. Moscow repays the debts of these "volunteers" at the rate of a hundred dollars a day.
tests.llm_output: There are many Russian mercenaries fighting in Luhansk and Donetsk, Ukraine, who are in fact insolvent loan debtors. Moscow pays the debts of these "volunteers" on the basis of $100 per day.

tests.input: Это опосредственный конфликт между бывшим президентом и бывшим вице-президентом, - сказал "Голосу Америки" Уильям А. Галстон, старший научный сотрудник программы исследований управления Брукингса, во время голосования во вторник.
tests.output: This is a proxy conflict between the former president and the former vice president, William A. Galston, a senior fellow in Brookings' Governance Studies program, told VOA as ballots were being cast on Tuesday.
tests.llm_output: "This is an indirect conflict between a former president and a former vice president," William A. Galston, a senior fellow at the Brookings Office Research Program, told Voice of America during Tuesday's vote.

tests.input: Это опосредованный конфликт между бывшим президентом и бывшим вице-президентом, - сказал "Голосу Америки" Уильям А. Галстон, старший научный сотрудник программы исследований управления Брукингса, во время голосования во вторник.
tests.output: This is a proxy conflict between the former president and the former vice president, William A. Galston, a senior fellow in Brookings' Governance Studies program, told VOA as ballots were being cast on Tuesday.
tests.llm_output: "It's a mediated conflict between a former president and a former vice president," William A. Galston, a senior fellow at the Brookings Office Research Program, told Voice of America during Tuesday's vote.

tests.input: Однажды Линус упрекнул Геракла в неусидчивости; тогда мальчик в ярости поднял свою лиру и со всей силы ударил по голове несчастного учителя, который, распростершись от удара, вскоре умер. И с тех пор никто не хотел браться за такую задачу.
tests.output: That Linus once reproached Hercules for not being studious; then, in a rage, the boy suddenly took up the lyre and struck with all his might the head of the unfortunate teacher, who, prostrated by the blow, soon after died. And no one after that wanted to take charge of such an office.
tests.llm_output: One day Linus reproached Hercules for not sitting still; then the boy raised his lyre in a rage and with all his might struck the unfortunate teacher on the head, who, prostrate from the blow, soon died. And from then on no one wanted to take on such a task.

tests.input: Ребята, не стоит вскрывать эту тему. Вы молодые, шутливые, вам все легко. Это не то. Это не Чикатило и даже не архивы спецслужб. Сюда лучше не лезть. Серьезно, любой из вас будет жалеть. Лучше закройте тему и забудьте, что тут писалось. Я вполне понимаю, что данным сообщением вызову дополнительный интерес, но хочу сразу предостеречь пытливых – стоп. Остальных просто не найдут.
tests.output: Guys, better not bring up this topic. You're young and playful, and everything's easy for you. It's not what you think. It's not Chikatilo, and not even FBI archives. Better not venture here. I'm serious: you will regret it. Better abandon the topic and forget everything written here. I quite understand this message provokes more interest, but I want to warn the curious: stop. Those who don't will never be found again.
tests.llm_output: Guys, there's no need to open up on this subject. You're young, you're joking, it's easy for you. This isn't it. This isn't Chikatilo or even the secret service archives. It's better to stay out of it. Seriously, any of you will be sorry. Better close the thread and forget what was written here. I quite understand that this message will cause additional interest, but I want to warn the inquisitive at once - stop. The rest simply will not find.

tests.input: Мне очень нравится этот форум, но один из самых бесячих моментов – количество здесь людей, которые принципиально не понимают ни в какой форме юмор и потому относятся ко всему слишком серьёзно. Это весьма раздражает, но приходится с этим жить.
tests.output: I like this board a lot, but one of the most frustrating things about it is the amount of posters here who have a serious lack of understanding of any form of humour and who consequently take things too seriously. It is a real annoyance but one has to live with it.
tests.llm_output: I really like this forum, but one of the most annoying things is the number of people here who fundamentally don't understand any form of humor and therefore take everything too seriously. It's quite annoying, but you have to live with it.
